def sort_rows(arr):
    """
    Sorts the rows of a 2D array in descending order based on their sums, 
    ignoring any rows that contain negative numbers.

    Args:
        arr (list of lists): The input 2D array.

    Returns:
        list of lists: A new 2D array with rows sorted in descending order.
    """
    row_sums = [sum(row) for row in arr if all((num > 0 for num in row))]
    sorted_arr = [x for (_, x) in sorted(zip(row_sums, [row for row in arr if all((num >= 0 for num in row))]), reverse=True)]
    return sorted_arr

mutants.original_line: row_sums = [sum(row) for row in arr if all(num >= 0 for num in row)]
mutants.mutated_line: sorted_arr = [x for (_, x) in sorted(zip(row_sums, [row for row in arr if all((num >= 0 for num in row))]), reverse=True)]

def sort_rows(arr):
    """
    Sorts the rows of a 2D array in descending order based on their sums, 
    ignoring any rows that contain negative numbers.

    Args:
        arr (list of lists): The input 2D array.

    Returns:
        list of lists: A new 2D array with rows sorted in descending order.
    """
    row_sums = [sum(row) for row in arr if all((num >= 0 for num in row))]
    sorted_arr = [x for (_, x) in sorted(zip(row_sums, [row for row in arr if all((num >= 1 for num in row))]), reverse=True)]
    return sorted_arr
